QuestData.Title: Heretics
QuestData.Description: Descend on Zul's fanatics and mogu allies. Hunt them down and slay them all with the fury of a true predator. Show them the true price of their betrayal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring ruin to the Temple of the Prophet.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Hexlord Raal at the Temple of the Prophet.
